summary: Create a premium, professional digital presence and branding package for Nagpur Grand Food & Catering (Dharampeth, Nagpur), including website layout and marketing assets aligned with the chosen color palette, tagline, services, and contact/WhatsApp CTAs.
architectural_notes: Brand direction: premium look using either “Premium Gold & Deep Charcoal” or “Classic White & Maroon” palette.
Include professional contact block (Pankaj 7620861034, Ashish 8888851877) and location (Dharampeth, Nagpur near Children’s Park).
Social handle: @NagpurGrandCatering; use chef-hat-with-smile logo as profile picture.
Display business name “Nagpur Grand Food & Catering” in bold.
Remove/hide any “aurumcoal” text/labeling from the UI/branding.
Remove/hide the “Brand Assets” / “Downloads” section and its heading text (“Download our professional branding materials”).
known_issues: Gallery section is not visible (likely rendering/layout/asset issue).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square logo derived from the uploaded image with transparent or clean dark background (ngfc-logo.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Small favicon-style icon derived from the uploaded image (ngfc-favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a premium single-page marketing website for “Nagpur Grand Food & Catering” with a hero section containing: (1) headline “Nagpur’s Trusted Name for Grand Occasions”, (2) sub-headline “Authentic North & South Indian Catering for Weddings, Corporate Events, and Special Celebrations.”, and (3) a primary CTA button labeled “Book Your Date”.

Implement a “Services” section displayed as a professional tile/grid with exactly these service categories and descriptions: (1) “Grand Weddings: Full-service catering from Achari to Buffet.” (2) “Corporate Events: Clean, professional high-tea and lunch setups.” (3) “Special Occasions: Birthdays, Anniversaries, and Puja ceremonies.”

Add a professional contact block that includes: Primary Contacts: Pankaj (7620861034) & Ashish (8888851877); Location: “Dharampeth, Nagpur (Near Children’s Park)”; Social handles: Instagram/Facebook “@NagpurGrandCatering”.

Add a floating WhatsApp inquiry button labeled “Inquire on WhatsApp” that opens WhatsApp chat to a configured phone number using wa.me links (use Pankaj’s number: 7620861034) and pre-fills a short message requesting a quote (English).

Apply a consistent premium visual theme across the site using a “Premium Gold & Deep Charcoal” palette (preferred) with modern typography, generous spacing, and elegant card styling; ensure the theme is used consistently across hero, services, gallery, and contact sections.
Create a “Gallery” section that showcases the uploaded catering/event photos in a premium grid with lightbox viewing (tap/click to enlarge).

Add a “Downloads” section that provides downloadable, print-ready branding assets: (1) a menu brochure, (2) a digital visiting card, and (3) a set of social media post templates, all aligned with the site branding (name, tagline, palette, contacts, location, @NagpurGrandCatering).

Add generated/curated static images (logo/wordmark, brochure, visiting card, social templates, and any decorative brand elements) into frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI where relevant (hero/logo, downloads previews).

Update the site header branding so the business name displays as exactly “Nagpur Grand Food & Catering” on a single line, fully bold, and remove any split styling that renders parts of the name in different weights/sizes.
Remove any user-visible occurrence of the text “aurumcoal” / “AurumCoal” from the website UI (e.g., footer credits, badges, labels, or metadata shown on the page).

Fix the Gallery section so it is visible on the page and the gallery grid renders reliably with the existing galleryImages list; ensure the section does not silently disappear due to missing assets or rendering errors.
Remove the entire Downloads section from the page, including its section header text "Brand Assets" and subheader text "Download our professional branding materials".
Update the header navigation to remove the "Downloads" link that points to #downloads, ensuring remaining navigation items continue to work.
Clean up unused Downloads-related code in the frontend (e.g., remove downloadAssets data, download handler logic, and any now-unused icon imports) so the project builds without lint/type errors.

Ensure the production frontend loads without missing critical static assets by adding the uploaded logo image as the canonical generated logo file(s) used by the UI and confirming all referenced `/assets/generated/*` and `/assets/gallery/*` paths used in `frontend/src/App.tsx` resolve at runtime.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a full website layout (premium look) with hero section, service grid/tiles, contact block, and CTAs like “Book Your Date”
Add a floating “Inquire on WhatsApp” button for instant quote inquiries

Remove the trap-only backend behavior so the canister can be deployed safely. Update `backend/main.mo` to no longer call `Runtime.trap("This should never be called. The backend actor must not be deployed")` and ensure the backend canister builds and deploys successfully.
